plot outline: Jana a cool corporate employee lives with his family in Mumbai. He has a secret life as a gangster who supports the well being of Mumbai Tamils. Jana's brother a cop finds Jana's name in their hit list and trice to make him quit but fails. Jana's family except him and his father are killed by other gangsters. following this tragedy they migrate to a village in Tamil Nadu ware Jana finds his girl. Jana kills the villain who killed his family as he followed Jana's girl from Mumbai to find him.
title: Jana
plot: _Jana_ (qv) always stands for his villagers, against the atrocities committed by Veerapandi. Manimegalai, Veerapandi's daughter, falls in love with _Jana_ (qv), but is stunned when she learns about his past life.

_Jana_ (qv) a cool corporate employee lives with his family in Mumbai. He has a secret life as a gangster who supports the well being of Mumbai Tamils. _Jana_ (qv)'s brother a cop finds _Jana_ (qv)'s name in their hit list and trice to make him quit but fails. _Jana_ (qv)'s family except him and his father are killed by other gangsters. following this tragedy they migrate to a village in Tamil Nadu ware _Jana_ (qv) finds his girl. _Jana_ (qv) kills the villain who killed his family as he followed _Jana_ (qv)'s girl from Mumbai to find him.::Arnold Melvin Xavier
